Name: Coco's Corner Shop

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text:
Excellent healthy food. Clean restaurant.
I ordered the protein smoothie, chicken sandwich and Nutty Acai Bowl; so filling and tasty.

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: We love Coco's Corner Shop. We found it last year during vacation, now we are always looking forward to eat at Coco's Everytime we visit Amsterdam. They have awesome fresh bowls, way better than your "basic" Acai Bowl.

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Had an amazing salad! Didn't try the sandwiches and juices but the menu looks very nice. 5 star service too. Recommended!

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Delicious sandwiches and innovative beverages! Incredible! I was a die hard Joe's and the Juice fan but believe me the fillings of Coco's sandwiches are a party for your taste buds and abundance  is their secret  recipe ,I guess ...Also their coffee is  worth trying...because there's this ice coffee which is a secret weapon

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Ordered a nutty acai bowl. It was just wat I needed for breakfast. Friendly staff and also delicious chai latte!

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: One of the best vegan sandwiches I‚Äôve ever had! Very very delicious. Super sweet people, very attentive and kind. You can taste how much effort is put into this! Highly recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è

Review Text: Keeps touching everything with her bare hands, then touches the food. Puts her vingers in her mouth.. then touches the food again‚Ä¶.. not very hygienic.. wont be coming back.

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Delicious sandwiches and juices. Friendly staff and cozy environment!!

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: What a lovely little place. Lots of vegan options, attentive staff. Vegan chicken sandwich to die for!! Big glasses of juice and fantastic coffees. Highly recommended.

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Delicious sandwiches and super nutritious juices. Loved it and will be back soon.

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: I was actually planning on going to SLA, but decided to try out Coco's as I passed by. It's a sweet little place and the set-up and use of space in this small corner deli is well thought off and it smells great. Also, the staff is really ‚Ä¶

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Cute place, great baked sandwiches and really good coffee with different types of milk. Also there are plenty of fresh fruit shakes/smoothies.

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: This is a sealed drink they delivered to me, costs 6 euros. Maybe someone on their staff drank the rest before delivery? üòÖ overall the staff is slow, often gets orders wrong ‚Äî- having said that the quality of food itself is not bad. I just ‚Ä¶

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Coffee is lovely, the worker I met there was super lovely and helpful

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text:
One of the best places in amsterdam , best stafff awesome people

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Nice, cosy place. Good coffee and fine sandwiches (very fatty so it's not a place you would eat every day, but still).

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: I wish to have more dining experiences like this. Delightfully happy staff who seem to absolutely love their work, and when the food arrives swiftly and tastes delicious it leaves little to be desired. They made me an off menu custom juice ‚Ä¶

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Amazing breakfast sandwich. Best I've had in Amsterdam so far.  Juice was fresh and nice though a bit watered down with ice, but seems to be the standard here in general.

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Sweet little healthy corner coffee . A cosy place to stay!

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Wow what a wonderful place! Works from 0800 to 2000. Best smoothies and great vibe. Loving it ‚ô°

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Excellent sandwiches ü•™ great value ‚Ä¶ and it big :-) enjoy üòâ

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: I had the chocolate lovers' shake, which was delicious. The only thing I would say was that it needed more peanut butter! The place itself is small but has 4 bar stools for seating in a small upper level. Cute place, nice staff. Would come back here to try another shake!

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text:
Very tiny shop for juices, sandwiches and a few baked goods. I got a carrot juice and a gf vegan shortbread, which was super good! The juice came in a single-use plastic cup even tho I drank it in the store, which bothered me so much :(
In my opinion it was a little expensive but everything there looked great!

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: I walked by and decided to have a flat white with soy milk. The coffee is organic, super creamy and tasty! Definitely I will go back every morning to have a coffee here :) Also it is vegan friendly

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Super nice place, stopped in for the smoothies but stayed for the sandwiches, definitely helped my hangover!

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Choose your drink wisely. The juices are so fresh and cold. You will love it.

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text:
Cocos  was a marvellous discovery for us !
The best unique healthy tasty sandwiches you could have !  Great Dutch bread.
And, a terrific Australian flavour. ‚Ä¶

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text: Tiny shop, but great selection of juices, smoothies, snacks, supplements and other healthy & tasty stuff. I only wish I was in Amsterdam longer so I could try even more of their huge selection of juice mixes!

Name: Coco's Corner Shop
Review Text:
Best vegan place i've met in Amsterdam. Great products with greater quality.
